name: Wild Wild West into the Future
name_original: Wild Wild West into the Future
description:
Goal: Establish dominance over the opponent

// Tutorial //

The player on the left use the left shift to shoot

The player on the right use the right shift to shoot

Take advantage of wacky physics to demolish the opponent

You have 10 lives before killed

Click Space to restart level.

You can practice with shooting before clicking play (Tons of health to practice)

// Start the game and quit the game //

Unzip and play by clicking on the 1buttonFightingGame.exe

To turn off the game, press space then click on quit or  alt + f4
